name: Managely
title: Employee Management Project
description: Managely is a full-stack MERN web application designed for companies to monitor employee workflow, manage salaries, and assign HR/admin roles securely. Built with role-based authentication using Firebase, integrated MongoDB database, and a responsive UI powered by Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI.

name: PlayFix
title: Repair Service Management Project
description: PlayFix is a full-stack MERN web application where users can offer, manage, and book servicing for gaming consoles like PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. Built with modern web technologies, it includes robust authentication, role-based dashboard features, booking workflows, and service status updates.

name: Recipe-Book
title: Recipe Management Project
description: A full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) web application where users can explore, add, like, and manage recipes. Built with Firebase authentication, MongoDB backend, and a fully responsive UI.
